PRESENTATION.LINE_3: I currently work with the following technologies:

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.P_1: I've been working with development for a few years, but outside of work, I enjoy tinkering with technology on my own.
ABOUT.P_2: Besides development, I'm also interested in infrastructure, networking, deployment, and automation.
ABOUT.P_3: In my free time, I like to experiment with tech at home. I run some self-hosted services like a file server, media center, VPN... they serve as my personal lab.
ABOUT.P_4: I also enjoy voxel art and occasionally try making some just for fun.
